room_title: Escape room "Wasted While" by Hint Hunter Puzzle Rooms in Biloxi
room_address: 10253 D'Iberville Blvd Suite B D'Iberville, MS 39540
room_description:
It is 1857, and Pike's Peak gold rush is drawing miners to the area, including a variety of unsavory characters inclined to steal claims. Among them, The Hooligan Gang have become especially notorious for appropriating other miner’s claims.
Dudley Babbit legitimately secured a mine that he named The Wasted While. With poor health requiring him to return to Denver, Dudley decides to hide hints and puzzles that only his family can solve. Fresh on the scene, can the Babbit family unravel the clues and secure Dudley’s claim before the pesky Hooligans do? Time will tell.
